channel.title: States on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in States on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - International - Locations - States - Filter and Quick edit
item.description: BO - International - Locations - States - Filter and Quick edit Steps Step Description Expected result Go to International ->locations> States the States page is displayed Reset all filters All filters are reset. All states are displayed Filter by ID of state created states list is filtered. states listed have the searched ID the ID of the state is well displayed on the top Reset all filters All filters are reset.

item.title: BO - International - Locations - States - Bulk actions
item.description: BO - International - Locations - States - Bulk actions Steps Step Description Expected result Go to International ->locations> States the States page is displayed Reset all filters All filters are reset. All states are displayed Select All states and Disable selection all them An alert “The status has been successfully updated.” is displayed and all states are disabled in the grid Select All states and Enable selection all them An alert “The status has been successfully updated.

item.title: BO - International - Locations - States - Sort and pagination
item.description: BO - International - Locations - States - Sort and pagination Steps Step Description Expected result Go to International ->locations> States the States page is displayed Reset all filters All filters are reset. All states are displayed Change the items number to 20 per page one page is displayed and the pagination number = page 1 /18 display :20/353 Click on next The second page is well displayed & the pagination number = page 2 / 18 Click on previous The first page is well displayed and the pagination number = page 1 /18 Change the items number to 100 per page Only one page is displayed (page 1 / 4) Sort state by ID desc states are sorted by postion (353 -> 352 -> …) Sort state by name desc states are sorted by name ( z-> y -> …) Sort state by ISO code desc states are sorted by ISO code ( z-> y -> …) Sort state by zone desc states are sorted by zone ( z-> y -> …) Sort state by country desc states are sorted by country ( z-> y -> …)
